title: sa_śivasaṃkalpopaniṣad
body: yénedámṃ bhūtáṃ bhúvanaṃ bhaviṣyát párigṛhītam amṛ́tena sárvam, yéna yajñás tāyáte saptáhótā tan me mánaś śivásaṅṃkalpam astu. yéna kármāṇy apáso manīṣíṇo yajñé kṛṇvánti vidátheṣu dhī́rāḥ, yád apūrváṃ yyakṣám antáḫḥ prajānānṃ tán me mánaś śivásaṅṃkalpam astu, yát prajñā́nam utá céto dhṛ́tiś ca yaj jyótir antár amṛ́taṃ prajā́su, yásmān ná ṛté kíñṃ caná kárma kriyáte tán me mánaś śivásaṅṃkalpam astu. yáj jā́grato dūrám udaíti daívaṃ tád u suptásya táthaivaíti, dūraṅṃgamáṃ jyótiṣāṃ jyótir ékaṃ tán me mánaś śivásaṅṃkalpam astu. yásmin ṛ́cas sā́ma yájūṃṣi yásmin prátiṣṭhitā rathanābhā́v ivārā́ḥ yásmim̐ṃś cittáṃ sárvam ótam prajānānṃ tán me mánaś śivásaṅṃkalpam astu. suṣārathír áśvān iva yán manuṣyā́n nenīyátebhī́śubhir vājína iva hṛtprátiṣṭhaṃ yyád ajiráñṃ jáviṣṭhanṃ tán me mánaś śivásaṅṃkalpam astu. yád átra ṣaṣṭháṃ triśatám̐ṃ śarīráṃ yajñásya gúhyanṃ návanā́bham ā́dyam, dáśa pañcatrim̐ṃśátaṃ yyát paráñṃ ca tán me mánaś śivásaṅṃkalpam astu. yé páñca pañcā́ daśatám̐ṃ śatáṃ ca sahásraṃ ca niyútaṃ nyárbudaṃ ca, te yajñacittéṣṭakāttám̐ṃ śárīraṃ tán me mánaś śivásaṅṃkalpam astu. védāhám etáṃ púruṣaṃ mahā́ntam ādityávarṇanṃ támasaḫḥ parástāt, tásya yóniṃ paripaśyanti dhī́rās tán me mánaś śivásaṅṃkalpam astu. yéna kármāṇi prácaranti dhīrā víprā vācā́ mánasā kármaṇā ca, saṃvvídam ánu sáṃyyanti prāṇínas tán me mánaś śivásaṅṃkalpam astu. yé máno hṛ́dayaṃ yyé ca devā́ yé antárikṣe bahudhā́ cáranti, yé śrotráṃ cakṣúṣī sáñṃcaranti tán me mánaś śivásaṅṃkalpam astu. yéna dyaúr ugrā́ pṛthivī́ cāntárikṣaṃ yé párvatāḫḥ pradíśo díśaś ca, yénedáñṃ jágad vyā́ptaṃ prajā́nānṃ tán me mánaś śivásaṅṃkalpam astu. yénedáṃ sárvaṃ jágato babhūvúr yé devā́ ápi maható jātávedāḥ, tád evā́gnitápaso jyotír ékanṃ tán me mánaś śivásaṅṃkalpam astu. aciṃntyaṃ cāprameyaṃ ca vyaktāvyaktaparaṃ ca yat, sūkṣmāt sūkṣmataraṃ jñānaṃ tán me mánaḥ śivasaṃkalpam astu. asti vināśayitvā sarvam idaṃ nāsti punas tathaivā dṛṣṭaṃ dhruvaṃ, asti nāsti hitaṃ madhyamaṃ padaṃ tan me manaḥ śivasaṃkalpam astu. asti nāsti viparīto pravāho 'sti nāsti sarvaṃ vā idaṃ guhyam, asti nāsti parāt paro yat paraṃ tan me manaḥ śivasaṃkalpam astu. parāt parataraṃ yasya tatparāc caiva tat paraṃ, tatparāt paratojñeyaṃ tan me manaḥ śivasaṃkalpam astu. parāt parataro brahma tatparāt parato hariḥ, tatparāt parato hy eṣa tan me manaḥ śivasaṃkalpam astu. gobhir juṣṭo dhanena hy āyuṣā ca balena ca, prajayā paśubhiḥ puṣkalādyaṃ tan me manaḥ śivasaṃkalpam astu. prayataḥ praṇavo nityaṃ paramaṃ puruṣottamaṃ, oṃkāraṃ param ātmānaṃ tan me manaḥ śivasaṃkalpam astu. yo vai vedādiṣu gāyatrī sarvavyāpī maheśvaraḥ, yad dviruktaṃ tathādvyaiśyaṃ tan me manaḥ śivasaṃkalpam astu. yo vai veda mahādevam paramaṃ puruṣottamaṃ, yaḥ sarvaṃ yasya cit sarvaṃ tan me manaḥ śivasaṃkalpam astu. yo 'sau sarveṣu vedeṣu pathate hy aja īśvaraḥ, akāyo nirguṇo dhyātvā tan me manaḥ śivasaṃkalpam astu. kailāśaśikhare ramye śaṃkarasya śubhe gṛhe, devatās tatra modyaṃnti tan me manaḥ śivasaṃkalpam astu. kailāśaśikharābhāsā hi bhavad girisaṃsthitāḥ, nīlakaṃṇṭhaṃ trinetraṃ ca tan me manaḥ śivasaṃkalpam astu. ābrahmastambaparyaṃntaṃ trailokyaṃ sacarācaram, utpātitaṃ jagad vyāptaṃ tan me manaḥ śivasaṃkalpam astu. ya imaṃ śivasaṃkalpam sadā dhyāyaṃnti brāhmaṇāḥ, te paramokṣaṃ gamiṣyaṃnti tan me manaḥ śivasaṃkalpam astu. tryambakaṃ yajāmahe sugaṃndhiṃ puṣṭivarddhanaṃ, urvārukam iva baṃndhanān mṛtyor mukṣīya māmṛtāt tan me manaḥ śivasaṃkalpam astu.
